page.title: 08STOURWOOD GARDEN CENTRE.
page.content: BY ELIZABETH SCULLION. STOURWOOD GARDEN CENTRE IS OWNED AND RUN BY MR.AND MRS.OAKLEY.IT OPENS EVERY DAY EXCEPT MONDAY.WEEKENDS ARE THE BUSIEST TIMES.ABOUT 60% OF THE CUSTOMERS COME FROM LOCAL VILLAGES,THE REST FROM MANNINGTREE AND DOVERCOURT.THE GARDEN CENTRE SELLS MANY KINDS OF PLANTS AND SEEDS.MR.AND MRS.OAKLEY BUY SOME TREES AND SHRUBS TO SELL FROM WHOLESALE NURSERIES;THEY GROW OTHERS THEMSELVES FROM CUTTINGS AND SEEDS.THE GARDEN CENTRE ALSO SELLS SHEDS,FENCING,PAVING,PATIO FURNITURE AND BARBECUE SETS.MR.OAKLEY REPAIRS AND SERVICES LAWN MOWERS AND ALSO SELLS OTHER GARDENING TOOLS.THE GARDEN CENTRE HAS AN INDOOR SHOP WHICH SELLS PESTICIDES ,WEEDKILLERS,SEEDS AND SWEETS.MRS.OAKLEY HAS 8 DUCKS AND 3 GEESE.SHE SELLS THE EGGS THEY LAY.
